thread.title: Rep. Ryan seeks unity from House GOP to run for speaker
thread.title_full: Rep. Ryan seeks unity from House GOP to run for speaker - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Erica Werner, Ap Congressional Correspondent
title: Rep. Ryan seeks unity from House GOP to run for speaker
text: Photo: Carolyn Kaster, AP Rep. Paul Ryan, R-Wis. leaves a causes meeting on Capitol Hill in Washington, Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015. Ryan, seeking unity in a place it's rarely found, is telling House Republicans he will serve as their speaker only if they embrace him by week's end as their consensus candidate. Rep. Paul Ryan, R-Wis. leaves a causes meeting on Capitol Hill in... WASHINGTON (AP) — Wisconsin Rep. Paul Ryan is seeking unity from divided House Republicans before he will serve as their speaker — a tall order as the split between GOP pragmatists and hardliners all but paralyzes Congress and roils the presidential race. Rep. Paul Ryan, R-Wis. leaves a causes meeting on Capitol Hill in Washington, Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015. Ryan, seeking unity in a place it's rarely found, is telling House Republicans he will serve as their speaker only if they embrace him by week's end as their consensus candidate. Rep. Paul Ryan, R-Wis. leaves a causes meeting on Capitol Hill in... WASHINGTON (AP) — Wisconsin Rep. Paul Ryan is seeking unity from divided House Republicans before he will serve as their speaker — a tall order as the split between GOP pragmatists and hardliners all but paralyzes Congress and roils the presidential race.
